hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Set the below parameters manually package_name="phantomjs" published_version="2.1.1"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles15.x/12.x, Ub16.x/18.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi
#Install dependencies sudo zypper update -y cat /etc/issue sudo zypper install -y gcc gcc-c++ make flex bison gperf ruby openssl-devel freetype-devel fontconfig-devel libicu-devel sqlite-devel libpng-devel libjpeg-devel python python-devel python-setuptools git sudo zypper install -y xorg-x11-devel xorg-x11-essentials xorg-x11-fonts xorg-x11 xorg-x11-util-devel libXfont-devel libXfont1 python-pytz
export phantomjs_home=`pwd`
#Install python module sudo easy_install argparse
cd phantomjs #Compile and link python build.py
#Run the test-suite cd $phantomjs_home cd phantomjs/test
#increasing the timeout(optional step) sed -i 's/TIMEOUT = 7/TIMEOUT = 30/' run-tests.py
python run-tests.py 2>&1 | tee testlogs && tail -4 testlogs > generated_failures
echo " 203 passed 4 passed unexpectedly 12 failed as expected 2 skipped" > expected_failures
diff -u --ignore-all-space generated_failures expected_failures
#Check the version cd $phantomjs_home cd phantomjs bin/phantomjs --version
